channel.title: Game of the Year on Data & Games
channel.description: Recent content in Game of the Year on Data & Games

item.title: And the Spiel des Jahres 2020 goes to…
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: For the impatient: If you don’t care about the data of previous winners and all you’re interested in are the candidates for this year’s awards, jump straight to the list… It’s that time of year again when the whole board game scene takes a deep look into their crystal balls: On Monday, May 18, the jury Spiel des Jahres will announce the nominees for the game of the year award in Germany.
